participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and enthusiastic about food and travel.
participant_1.background: hey there i'm 23 and i love food. i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i'm not using it. i've been traveling the world for a years.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Resilient and passionate about sports, always looking for new opportunities.
participant_2.background: i work in the insurance business. my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. my mom passed away when i was young. i love playing softball.

content.text: hello how are you today? i'm doing well.
what are you up to? do you have any hobbies?
